column5: On my computer my screen saver goes to random pictures I have stored and this one came up. I liked it so much I thought I would share it with you guys.  Fishing the French River June 30th 2008 with my two sons.  Maybe others have some that they would like to share also.  Bob
That right there is an amazing photo!

I'd call that one "The Ultimate Angler" Photos are treasures. I have some of my dad.None digital though.I have one on the wall in my office.He's at attention, saluting and accepting his new rank.Master Warrant Officer.You said it...memories of days gone bye.
That's what I keep telling my fishing partner...LOL..
